description: We offer both free and paid services. However, the free plan has some limitations which are maintained in paid plans. Check out your feasible plan, here: https://app.picovico.com/plans
title: Is this a free service?
description_text: We offer both free and paid services. However, the free plan has some limitations which are maintained in paid plans. Check out your feasible plan, here: https://app.picovico.com/plans

description: ​​​​Picovico is an online video making platform. But, you can easily download your video for offline access, once it is created.
title: Can I use this software for offline editing?
description_text: ​​​​Picovico is an online video making platform. But, you can easily download your video for offline access, once it is created.

description: Yes, you can. Once you hit the 'Create' button after adding required media, you will be able to preview your video by clicking on 'Generate Preview' in the finalize screen. However, the preview will be comparatively of lower quality than the actual video.
title: Can I preview the video prior to creation?
description_text: Yes, you can. Once you hit the 'Create' button after adding required media, you will be able to preview your video by clicking on 'Generate Preview' in the finalize screen. However, the preview will be comparatively of lower quality than the actual video.

description:
The different plans have different video limits per month:

Free

Premium

title: How many videos can I create with a free/paid plan?
description_text:
The different plans have different video limits per month: 


Plans 


Video Limit 



Free 

20 videos/month 



Premium 

50 videos/month 



Pro 

100 videos/month

description: The default frame time of each slide is scheduled for 5 seconds. But it can be increased by 7 seconds per slide. So for standard, premium and pro accounts, the maximum length of video is 7*20 seconds, 7*30 seconds and 7*60 seconds, respectively.
title: What is the maximum length of video that I can make with Picovico?
description_text: The default frame time of each slide is scheduled for 5 seconds. But it can be increased by 7 seconds per slide. So for standard, premium and pro accounts, the maximum length of video is 7*20 seconds, 7*30 seconds and 7*60 seconds, respectively.

description: It is simple. Go to 'My Video' page and choose the video you want to delete. Click the menu icon [☰] in the video thumbnail and choose ‘Delete’.
title: How do I delete the videos?
description_text: It is simple. Go to 'My Video' page and choose the video you want to delete. Click the menu icon [☰] in the video thumbnail and choose ‘Delete’.

description: In case your video length is longer than the length of music used, the same piece of music will get repeated in the video.
title: What happens if my video is longer than the music?
description_text: In case your video length is longer than the length of music used, the same piece of music will get repeated in the video.

description: Picovico supports all modern browsers having cookies and JavaScript enabled.
title: Which browsers are best for Picovico?
description_text: Picovico supports all modern browsers having cookies and JavaScript enabled.

description: While in the step to add media (photo, videos and text), there is a button for 'Settings' in the right corner of the menu bar. Click on it and change your preferences. Hit the 'Save' button to restore the changes.
title: Where can I define the slide duration?
description_text: While in the step to add media (photo, videos and text), there is a button for 'Settings' in the right corner of the menu bar. Click on it and change your preferences. Hit the 'Save' button to restore the changes.
